trans-unit.source: In this section, you'll write a Windows console app that sends events to your Event Hub.
trans-unit.target: In this section, you'll write a Windows console app that sends events to your Event Hub.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, create a new Visual C# Desktop App project using the **Console Application** project template.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, create a new Visual C# Desktop App project using the **Console Application** project template.

trans-unit.source: In Solution Explorer, right-click the solution, and then click **Manage NuGet Packages for Solution...**.
trans-unit.target: In Solution Explorer, right-click the solution, and then click **Manage NuGet Packages for Solution...**.

trans-unit.source: This displays the Manage NuGet Packages dialog box.
trans-unit.target: This displays the Manage NuGet Packages dialog box.

trans-unit.source: Search for `Microsoft Azure Service Bus`, click **Install**, and accept the terms of use.
trans-unit.target: Search for `Microsoft Azure Service Bus`, click **Install**, and accept the terms of use.

trans-unit.source: This downloads, installs, and adds a reference to the Azure Service Bus library NuGet package.
trans-unit.target: This downloads, installs, and adds a reference to the Azure Service Bus library NuGet package.

trans-unit.source: Add the following `using` statement at the top of the **Program.cs** file:
trans-unit.target: Add the following `using` statement at the top of the **Program.cs** file:

trans-unit.source: Add the following fields to the **Program** class, substituting the placeholder values with the name of the Event Hub you created in the previous section, and the connection string with **Send** rights:
trans-unit.target: Add the following fields to the **Program** class, substituting the placeholder values with the name of the Event Hub you created in the previous section, and the connection string with **Send** rights:

trans-unit.source: Add the following method to the **Program** class:
trans-unit.target: Add the following method to the **Program** class:

trans-unit.source: This method continuously sends events to your Event Hub with a 200ms delay.
trans-unit.target: This method continuously sends events to your Event Hub with a 200ms delay.
